Requires Java 11 or higher.

BattleshipGame - Class in de.htw.battleship
An instance of this class holds the state of a running match and the game logic.
BattleshipGame(int, String) - Constructor for class de.htw.battleship.BattleshipGame
Creates a new game with new boards.
BattleshipGame(Board, Board, int, String, int) - Constructor for class de.htw.battleship.BattleshipGame
Creates a game based on saved boards from a previous game.
Board - Class in de.htw.battleship
Holds the state of one players board as well as the methods to generate a board and process shots.
Board() - Constructor for class de.htw.battleship.Board
Create a new Board and generate ships
Board(String, ArrayList<Ship>) - Constructor for class de.htw.battleship.Board
Create a Board and add its ships from an exported string.
BOARD_SIZE - Static variable in class de.htw.battleship.Board
